lore: Griffons protect the Azure Dream, and there is always a legion of them flying over the clouds in search of intruders. During mating season, their flocks gather in the air and can even block out the sun across a wide area.\n\nAlthough their ability to wield weapons cannot be compared to that of a human, Assault Griffons can inflict great damage by charging at their enemies with great speed, passing them by without exposing themselves to a counterattack.
menagerieDialog: (It's screeching uncontrollably while digging its claws into the ground.)
(It seems to be quite lonely. Perhaps you should summon a she-Griffon to keep it company.)
(It's pretending to be hungry, but you know full well that it has already eaten more than its fair share of food. Greedy little slob.)
(It shies away from your touch. It clearly doesn't want to be bothered right now.)
name: Assault Griffon
